d2_dictionary.object_name: DQL - General - Indications for selected product
d2_dictionary.title: Provides a list of indications (symptoms) defined in the Product Registration Form for a product.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
d2_dictionary.dql: select distinct indication as name from cd_product_info where product_code='$value(product_code)' order by 1
